sentences.sContent: The chain says it has found upwards of 4,000 messages online containing libelous claims—including photos!
sentences.sContent_eng: The chain says it has found upwards of 4,000 messages online containing libelous claims—including photos!
sentences.sCn: 链说它发现了4000以上的网上留言含有诽谤索赔包括照片！

synos.tran: 诽谤的；损害名誉的；用言语中伤他人的
